property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
Information about an Exemption.
Extra data qualifies the exemption to a particular scope, such as for a particular Course or Program.
There can only be one override structure per exemption. The override structure available in this Exemption is constrained by the Exemption Type.

property.name: summary
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: description
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Exemption Request Id

property.name: summary
property.value: The Id of the Exemption Request.

property.name: label
property.value: Exemption Request Id

property.name: description
property.value: The Id of the Exemption Request.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Process Key

property.name: summary
property.value: The id of a Process that is being exempted in the the exemption is applied.

property.name: label
property.value: Process Id

property.name: description
property.value:
The id of a Process that is being exempted in the the exemption is applied.
Together with the check this identifies which instruction(s) to skip or or data to be overridden when the process is being evaluated.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Check Id

property.name: summary
property.value: The Id of a Check that indicates to what Check in the Process the exemption is applied.

property.name: label
property.value: Check Id

property.name: description
property.value: The Id of a Check that indicates to what Check in the Process the exemption is applied.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Person Id

property.name: summary
property.value: The Id of the Person who was exempted.

property.name: label
property.value: Person Id

property.name: description
property.value:
The Id of the Person who was exempted.
This is the same as the person id on the request.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Use Limit

property.name: summary
property.value: The number of times this Exemption may be used.

property.name: label
property.value: Use Limit

property.name: description
property.value:
The number of times this Exemption may be used.
Should be a positive integer or left null to indicate there is no limit.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Use Count

property.name: summary
property.value: The number of times this Exemption was marked as used.

property.name: label
property.value: Use Count

property.name: description
property.value:
The number of times this Exemption was marked as used.
Null means that it has not been used or is not being tracked because there is no corresponding limit.

property.name: summary
property.value: Create and last update info for the structure.

property.name: description
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.
